title: M2TW: Kingdoms Teutonic Hotseat - Lithuania #13 - Mongolian Invasion
description:
Another Awesome HotSeat Campaign.  With some Awesome Youtubers!

part 13

Teutonic Campaign.
Players in turn order:

Novgorod: LegendofTotalWar https://www.youtube.com/user/LegendofTotalWar
Norway: The Wise Coffin https://www.youtube.com/user/TheWiseCoffin
Lithuania: Pixelated Apollo https://www.youtube.com/user/PixelatedApollo1
Teutonic Order: WarriorofSparta https://www.youtube.com/user/1984warriorofsparta
HRE: Rampaned https://www.youtube.com/user/Rampaned
Poland: TsarBG https://www.youtube.com/user/TsarOfBulgaria
Danes: The Rambler (Alex) https://www.youtube.com/user/therambler146
Mongols: Lionheartx10 https://www.youtube.com/user/lionheartx10

RULES:
http://www.twcenter.net/forums/showthread.php?671649-Second-Youtuber-Hotseat-Teutonic-Campaign-Call-to-Arms!
